availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, jailer. Virginia native. Jailer in Carroll County, Kentucky, in 1850. Jailer in Carroll County in 1860. Jailer in Carroll County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District 1, p. 190B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Carrollton, p. 22.
"David Owen (1772-1865)," Find A Grave, Memorial 30758252, accessed August 16, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/30758252.
KYR-0001-006-0016.
